languages.text: Ужас сковывает команду при звуках приказа, однако люди подчиняются безропотно. Зеркало остается на хранении в надежно опечатанном отсеке. Корабль продолжает путь.

traits.locale_text: Ужас сковывает команду при звуках приказа, однако люди подчиняются безропотно. Зеркало остается на хранении в надежно опечатанном отсеке. Корабль продолжает путь.

languages.text: The crew seem numb with horror as they hear the order, yet they obey without a word. The mirror remains in a sealed compartment while the ship continues its journey onward.
languages.original_text: Ужас сковывает команду при звуках приказа, однако люди подчиняются безропотно. Зеркало остается на хранении в надежно опечатанном отсеке. Корабль продолжает путь.

traits.locale_text: The crew seem numb with horror as they hear the order, yet they obey without a word. The mirror remains in a sealed compartment while the ship continues its way through the void.
The crew seem numb with horror as they hear the order, yet they obey without a word. The mirror remains in a sealed compartment while the ship continues its way through the void.
The crew seem numb with horror as they hear the order, yet they obey without a word. The mirror remains in a sealed compartment while the ship continues its way through the void.
The crew seem numb with horror as they hear the order, yet they obey without a word. The mirror remains in a sealed compartment while the ship continues its journey onward.
The crew seem numb with horror as they hear the order, yet they obey without a word. The mirror remains in a sealed compartment while the ship continues its journey onward.
The crew seem numb with horror as they hear the order, yet they obey without a word. The mirror remains in a sealed compartment while the ship continues its journey onward.

languages.text: 船员们听到这个命令时，似乎全都被吓呆了，但他们却一言不发地执行了这个命令。镜子被放在密闭的船舱里，而飞船继续朝前方行驶。
languages.original_text: The crew seem numb with horror as they hear the order, yet they obey without a word. The mirror remains in a sealed compartment while the ship continues its journey onward.

traits.locale_text: 船员们听到这个命令时，似乎全都被吓呆了，但他们却一言不发地执行了这个命令。镜子被放在密闭的船舱里，而飞船继续朝前方行驶。

languages.text: El miedo enmudece a la tripulación en cuanto {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán da la orden, pero obedecen sin rechistar. El espejo se queda en un compartimento sellado mientras la nave continúa su viaje.
languages.original_text: The crew seem numb with horror as they hear the order, yet they obey without a word. The mirror remains in a sealed compartment while the ship continues its journey onward.

traits.locale_text: El miedo enmudece a la tripulación en cuanto {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán da la orden, pero obedecen sin rechistar. El espejo se queda en un compartimento sellado mientras la nave continúa su viaje.

languages.text: 命令が下された際、クルーは恐怖で麻痺しているように見えたが、何も言わずに従った。鏡は密閉された区画室に置かれたまま、船は旅を続けていく。
languages.original_text: The crew seem numb with horror as they hear the order, yet they obey without a word. The mirror remains in a sealed compartment while the ship continues its journey onward.

traits.locale_text: 命令が下された際、クルーは恐怖で麻痺しているように見えたが、何も言わずに従った。鏡は密閉された区画室に置かれたまま、船は旅を続けていく。

languages.text: Als die Crew den Befehl hört, ist sie vor Entsetzen wie betäubt, gehorcht aber ohne ein Wort. Der Spiegel verbleibt in einem versiegelten Modul und das Schiff setzt seine Reise fort.
languages.original_text: The crew seem numb with horror as they hear the order, yet they obey without a word. The mirror remains in a sealed compartment while the ship continues its journey onward.

traits.locale_text: Als die Crew den Befehl hört, ist sie vor Entsetzen wie betäubt, gehorcht aber ohne ein Wort. Der Spiegel verbleibt in einem versiegelten Modul und das Schiff setzt seine Reise fort.

languages.text: L'équipage reçoit l'ordre avec une horreur manifeste, mais il obéit sans un mot. Le miroir reste dans un compartiment scellé, pendant que le vaisseau poursuit son voyage.
languages.original_text: The crew seem numb with horror as they hear the order, yet they obey without a word. The mirror remains in a sealed compartment while the ship continues its journey onward.

traits.locale_text: L'équipage reçoit l'ordre avec une horreur manifeste, mais il obéit sans un mot. Le miroir reste dans un compartiment scellé, pendant que le vaisseau poursuit son voyage.
